Upsert-Post-Challenges.name: Upsert Post Challenges
Upsert-Post-Challenges.body:
fn(state => {
  function transform(value) {
    if (!value) return;
    switch (value.toString().trim().toLowerCase()) {
      case 'true':
      case 'yes':
      case 'agree':
      case 'concordo':
      case 'verdade':
      case 'copy-1-of-yes':
      case 'choice1':
        return 1;
      case 'false':
      case 'no':
      case 'disagree':
      case 'discordo':
      case 'falso':
      case 'copy-1-of-no':
      case 'choice3': 
      case 'choice6': 
        return 2;
      case 'i_dont_know':
      case 'na':
        return 3;
      case 'unanswered':
      case `not_sexually_active`:
        return 4;
      case 'not_applicable':
        return 5;
      default:
        return value;
    }
  }

  state.helperFunctions = { transform };

  return query(
    `SELECT Participant_Identification_Number_PID__c from Person__c where Participant_Identification_Number_PID__c  = '${state.data.form.case['@case_id']}'`
  )(state);
});

fn(state => {
